code: import*as Yup from"yup";export var validationSchema=Yup.object().shape({firstName:Yup.string().required("First Name is required"),lastName:Yup.string().required("Last Name is required"),email:Yup.string().email("Enter a valid email").required("Please enter a registered email"),password:Yup.string().required("Please enter a password").min(6,"Password must have at least 6 characters"),confirmPassword:Yup.string().required("Please confirm password").oneOf([Yup.ref("password")],"Password & Confirm Password does not match")});
